content: Ok, I've looked everywhere, but can't find anything definitive. Where does sct-edition go now that we aren't using ig.json any more? In the IG resource as a parameter? (It's not listed as a valid parameter..)
the IG resource refers to an expansion profile, and the sct version goes in there
Is there an example somewhere, or some documentation I can look at?
I've looked at a ton of IGs but all the ones I look at are still using the ig.json file so not much help.
take one that does, and build it. The publisher will generate the equivalent set up including the sct version bit

expansion profile

@Grahame Grieve interesting, is this some sort of remnant of the old STU3 resource of the same name, or something completely different?
It's actually a Parameters resource, and i should have called 'expansion parameters'. the remnant was in my head
